get.summary: Get a specific asset transaction
Get all fixed assets with pagination and optional category/subcategory filtering
get.description:
- category_id: Filter by specific category ID
- subcategory: Filter by subcategory name (case-insensitive partial match)

post.summary: Bulk create multiple assets with detailed error reporting
post.description:
First validates all assets, then adds only the valid ones to the database.

Returns a comprehensive report including:
- Summary statistics (total, added, rejected, success rate)
- List of successfully added assets
- List of rejected assets with detailed error information

put.summary: Bulk update multiple assets with detailed error reporting
put.description:
First validates all asset updates, then applies only the valid ones to the database.

Returns a comprehensive report including:
- Summary statistics (total, updated, rejected, success rate)
- List of successfully updated assets
- List of rejected assets with detailed error information

get.summary: Export all assets to Excel file with optional category/subcategory filtering
get.description:
Returns Excel file containing:
- Filter information at the top (if filters are applied)
- Complete list of assets with all details

Optional filters:
- category_id: Filter by specific category ID
- subcategory: Filter by subcategory name (case-insensitive partial match)

get.summary: Search assets by name (text) or product code/barcode (number)
get.description:
- If query contains letters: searches in name_ar and name_en fields
- If query is numeric: searches by exact product_code match

parameters.description: Search query (text for name search or number for barcode search)
parameters.name: q

get.summary: Get a specific asset
Generate a barcode for a specific asset

post.summary: Login user and get access token

delete.summary: Delete a specific user by ID (Admin only)

get.description:

- subcategory: Filters by specific subcategory name

parameters.description: Search in category or subcategory names

First validates all categories, then adds only the valid ones to the database.

Returns a comprehensive report including:
- Summary statistics (total, added, rejected, success rate)
- List of successfully added categories
- List of rejected categories with detailed error information

get.summary: Get all transactions with pagination and filtering

parameters.description: Search in description or reference number
parameters.name: search

post.summary: Create a new transaction with asset transactions

parameters.name: data

get.summary: Get average cost for asset from IN transactions
Generate comprehensive transaction report as Excel file
get.description:
Returns Excel file with:
- Filter information at the top
- Asset-wise summary including:
  * Asset name and details
  * Total quantity IN and OUT
  * Total amount IN and OUT  
  * Total cost (quantity  amount) IN and OUT
  * Overall totals

REQUIRED: date parameter must be provided
Optional filters can be combined:
- Category: ?category=Electronics
- Subcategory: ?subcategory=Laptops (can be used with or without category)
- Branch/Warehouse: ?branch_id=1 or ?warehouse_id=1

get.summary: Generate comprehensive transaction report with asset-level analysis
get.description:
Returns asset-wise summary including:
- Asset name and details
- Total quantity IN and OUT
- Total amount IN and OUT  
- Total cost (quantity  amount) IN and OUT
- Overall totals

REQUIRED: date parameter must be provided
Optional filters can be combined:
- Category: ?category=Electronics
- Subcategory: ?subcategory=Laptops (can be used with or without category)
- Branch/Warehouse: ?branch_id=1 or ?warehouse_id=1

info.title: Fixed Assets Management API
info.description: A comprehensive API for managing fixed assets, warehouses, branches, users, and job roles with role-based permissions

Bearer Auth.name: Authorization
Bearer Auth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"

errors.description: Validation errors (object with field names as keys)

branch_id.description: Branch ID this warehouse belongs to
Branch ID this warehouse belongs to

category_data.description: Original category data that was rejected

category_id.description: Category ID this asset belongs to

product_code.description: Product code or serial number (used for barcode)

category_id.description: Category ID this asset belongs to

product_code.description: Product code used for the barcode

permissions.description: Custom user permissions (optional, defaults to role permissions)

user_id.description: User ID who created the transaction
